so_40729799: How to add values to bash arrays?
Top-3 Scripts:
so_38779095: array=()

item_to_add="1 '2 3'"

while IFS= read -r -d '' item; do # read NUL-delimited stream
  array+=( "$item" )              # and add each piece to an array
done < <(xargs printf '%s\0' <<<"$item_to_add") # transform string to NUL-delimited stream

printf 'item: %s\n' "${array[@]}"

so_40729799: while read

while read -r line; do
  symbol=${line%%" "*}
  missed_symbols+=("$symbol")
done < <(grep missed ${dest}/scribe.log)

ul_609287: Bash array appending element issue
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_609287: # start with a clean slate
unset you

for i in "fgt" "fe" "ger"; do
    you+=("$i")
done

printf "%s\n" "${you[@]}"

unset you
for i in "fgt" "fe" "ger"; do
    you[${#you[@]}]="$i"
done
printf "%s\n" "${you[@]}"

Top-3 Similar Questions: au_165147: Bash script to add/remove desktop launchers to Unity launcher?
Top-3 Scripts:
au_165147: #!/bin/bash
myfile='firefox.desktop'
list=`gsettings get com.canonical.Unity.Launcher favorites`
newlist=`echo $list | sed s/]/", '${myfile}']"/`
gsettings set com.canonical.Unity.Launcher favorites "$newlist"
